item.title: EP 301 - The Cursed Heart
item.itunes:title: The Cursed Heart
item.description:
Today we try to contact ETs using magic, and then we hope we never have to get an organ transplant!

Patreon

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

CONTACT PROTOCOLS

https://www.ce5texas.com/ce5-contact-protocols.php

 

100 YEARS AGO?—?DID CROWLEY USHER IN THE MODERN UFO WAVE WITH AN INTER-DIMENSIONAL PORTAL?

http://www.paranoiamagazine.com/2018/02/100-years-ago%E2%80%8A-%E2%80%8Adid-crowley-usher-modern-ufo-wave-inter-dimensional-portal/

 

Recipient of suicide victim’s heart kills self 12 years later

https://www.seattletimes.com/seattle-news/health/recipient-of-suicide-victims-heart-kills-self-12-years-later/

 

He Got A Heart Transplant From A Suicide Victim, Married The Donor's Wife And Then Killed Himself

https://www.ranker.com/list/heart-transplant-suicide-victims-share-wife/hugh-landman

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
